answers.answer: It is important to try to eat healthy because you can develop gestational diabetes which is scary for you and baby. Just try to replace cupcakes with watermelon, strawberries, or grapes. Its still sweet but its healthy for you too. If that doesn't work then at least offset your unhealthy cravings with something healthy. Like a cupcake and a salad. And keep taking your prenatals at least until your second trimester.
Indulging here and there is fine but like kiwi said try and do some healthy alternatives or sugar free sweets.
Ok thanks,  I have been taking my prenatals since I found out I was pregnant and im in my third trimester now.

I crave sweets too! I have something sweet everyday, I totally understand how hard it is to stay away but I also eat my vegies, fruit and lots of dairy! My little seems to love sweets too though lol gets her movin!

question: I have been craving everything sweet since day one with this little guy and I cant help it. I will get just a little taste of something sweet and just want more and more. I ate 4 cup cakes once. How bad is this?
title: will my cravings hurt my baby?
